first_convo: Welcome young one! I can see you are ready for the battle of strength. Are you ready to push to your limits? Are you ready to taste glory? ARE YOU READY TO FACE DEATH??
The more fierce weapon, the most vicious tool, the mighty watering are you ready to wield this terrifying tool???
Go outside with this can, and water the grass 5 - no 10 - no TWENTY FIVE TIMES!!
If you survive, you can undertake the final challenge.
final_convo: Go warrior. Wield this fould tool of destruction!!!!
